New experiments physico-mechanicall, touching the spring of the air, and its effects (made, for the most part, in a new pneumatical engine) : written by way of letter to the Right Honorable Charles, Lord Vicount of Dungarvan, eldest son to the Earl of Corke / by the Honorable Robert Boyle, Esq. Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
[35], 399 [i.e. 389], [1] p., 1 folded leaf of plates : ill.
Printed by H. Hall ... for Tho. Robinson, Oxford : 1660.
Errata: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library. Imperfect: folded plate lacking.
=======

Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
[35], 399 [i.e. 389], [1] p., 1 folded leaf of plates : ill.
Printed by H. Hall ... for Tho. Robinson, Oxford : 1660.
